vulnerability.name: USN-7550-2
vulnerability.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - GPU drivers;   - Sun RPC protocol; (CVE-2024-56608, CVE-2024-56551, CVE-2024-53168)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in the Linux kernel.
